review:
I am writing this testimonial to thank Dr. Rajat Sachdeva and I feel privileged to have benefitted from his services. For background, I had multiple amalgam fillings in my teeth that I had got done around 10 years back. It was until very late that I realized that these fillings contains mercury which can cause numerous side effects. 
I had been suffering from painful sores for the last few years, almost since the time I got these amalgam fillings. I never could understand the reason behind this and neither did my previous dentist. The sores were unrelenting and so painful that I wasn’t able to eat or even talk properly. No amount of antibiotics or painkillers would work and I had a constant burning sensation in my mouth. Fortunately, when one of my friends recommended Dr. Rajat Sachdeva’s clinic in Ashok Vihar, I immediately visited him. After a thorough examination and consultation, Dr. Rajat informed me that my mouth sores and ulcers were actually because of the amalgam fillings containing mercury. He suggested that we immediately remove these and replace them with non-metallic, biocompatible composite material. After my wilful consent, Dr. Rajat proceeded with the treatment and almost immediately, my sores disappeared and has not recurred ever since. 
SMART (Safe Mercury Amalgam Removal Technique) was followed while strictly adhering to all the safety regulations. An amalgam separator was specially installed which was utilized to collect the mercury and the operating room was well-ventilated with a high-volume air filtration system. I was made to wear the protective gear including nasal masks, gowns and head cover. The entire team assisting the procedure including Dr. Rajat were well-protected too. A rubber was used to avoid any spillage and all the materials used were non-latex and sterile. The entire procedure was done with High speed evacuation and with utmost precision. Once the procedure was over, the operating team carefully eliminated and disposed mercury wastage while maintaining all the safety protocols. The level of professionalism seen was highly reassuring.
I am extremely thankful to Dr. Rajat for the pioneering individual he is and believing his knowledge and experience beyond the scope of controversy. He is a brilliant diagnostician and very professional. I hold high regard for him and would definitely recommend him to everyone.

review: I had unfortunately lost my front tooth due to an accident a couple of years back. Although I got a temporary restoration for it, my smile has never been the same. Not only did this affect my smile but also my speech. I was recommended to Dr. Rajat Sachdeva’s clinic by a friend of mine.  After a long hiatus between my dental visits, I was apprehensive and very nervous but I can say that I had the best experience at Dr. Rajat’s clinic as he made me most comfortable and relaxed. He suggested me to go for an implant for my missing tooth, and based on my CBCT scans, it was the best option for me. So, I decided to choose a single dental implant. Since it was the front tooth and had significant effect on my smile, the dentist was extremely careful and meticulously planned the entire treatment. I was even shown the end-result and it looked very promising.  I was called in early on the day of surgery, and the entire procedure did not even take an hour. It was completely painless and minimally invasive. I was able to see the procedure as it was being done on the screen, and it was later given to me as my dental record. The attention to details and executing the treatment to perfection would definitely be the stand-outs of this clinic. The practice is very professional and compassionate at the same time. Throughout the process, everything was described in detail as to the road ahead, the timescale of all future visits, the costs which were spread over the whole dental treatment and the follow up visits and regular checking on all dental issues.  After the procedure, I was given a temporary restoration so that I wouldn’t be toothless. My final crown came a few weeks later and it fitted like a glove. The shape, size and color of the crown was just like my other tooth, and it perfectly blended in. My speech was also clearer, the lisp was gone and I finally had a clear diction. This was truly the best possible outcome that I expected to achieve with my implant.  Dr. Rajat’s clinic is truly a perfect place for getting your dental problems treated. They run an excellent, highly organized and exceptionally clean practice with top-notch facilities and technology. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this place to anyone.

review:
I am not someone who frequently visits a dentist, but when I happen to consult Dr. Rajat Sachdeva, I was pleasantly surprised by the advancement in the field of dentistry. Dr. Rajat’s dental clinic in Ashok Vihar can be truly called a representation of painless dentistry. 
Owing to years of neglect and malfunction, I had ended up with a rather unpleasant smile. I had a few missing teeth and several of them were completely worn out. When I consulted Dr. Rajat with my issues, he was very supportive and motivated me to go for a full mouth smile makeover. Before we moved forward with my case, a CBCT scan was advised which revealed in-and-out of my teeth and jaws. Based on the interpretations of these scans, Dr. Rajat formulated the treatment plan; which consisted of many procedures which included rehabilitation of missing teeth, crowns and veneers for worn-out teeth and to fill the gaps between my upper front teeth. Most of teeth were decayed and had to be restored as well. 
As the treatment started, I was made quite comfortable and even the complex of the procedures like placement of implants were done effortlessly. In all my appointments, the chair time did not exceed for more than an hour and that just shows the expertise of your treating dentist. Emax and Zirconia crowns were fabricated using CAD CAM software and the value they added to my aesthetics was substantial. 
Several of my teeth were decayed, few of which needed root canal treatments. Lasers was used to eliminate the infection completely and quickly too. It was definitely reassuring to be able to watch the procedure done on your teeth, and Dr. Rajat made it possible by use of dental microscopes. I could actually see what exactly went in and came out of those tiny canals. The evolution of dentistry never ceased to amaze me. 
For the final touch, I underwent a teeth whitening procedure using Philips Zoom! equipment. It is a rather magical technique, for the results were eminent immediately. Overall, I can say that Dr. Rajat has worked wonders with my smile and I can only than him and his team for my newfound confidence. Not only that, my function has also improved considerably and I can now bite into my favorite foods without any fear of sensitivity or pain. Thank you for giving me a confident smile.

My smile has been my strength and I always used to get compliments for it. Of late, my teeth weren’t appearing as white as they used to and they appeared yellow. When I finally decided to do something about it, I consulted Dr. Rajat Sachdeva. He is a renowned cosmetic dentist in Ashok Vihar, Delhi. The procedure began by covering my lips and gums and only my teeth were exposed. This was done apparently to protect them from the UV light. The entire process of teeth whitening using Philips Zoom whitening procedure took about just an hour and the results were mind-blowing. My teeth looked significantly whiter and my smile was radiant. I would like to thank Dr. Rajat and his team for their incredible work with my teeth. I really appreciate it. I would highly recommend his clinic for such cosmetic procedures.

review:
I have recently got my frenectomy procedure done by Dr. Rajat Sachdeva at his clinic in Ashok Vihar. It has been a very comfortable and pleasant experience that has given me back my confidence. I had a tongue-tie since childhood and have been struggling because of it all my childhood. My basic functions like eating and talking were affected to an extent that I had become a complete introvert. 
When I consulted Dr. Rajat about my problem, he informed me that my frenum (or frenulum) below the tongue was short and abnormally attached to the floor of the mouth. He advised me to get frenectomy done using laser technique.
The procedure was absolutely painless and safe and was carried out in the clinic by Dr. Rajat himself. I was first made completely comfortable in my chair with a light, soothing music. The procedure was explained to me first before being carried out, further calming my nerves. As the procedure began, I was given a topical anesthetic spray on the frenum so that the needle prick would not hurt. Thereafter, local anesthesia was administered in that area. Within minutes, I was completely numb in and around the frenulum part. The entire procedure then was carried out using lasers, where they incised the tissue using a laser-activated surgical tip. There was minimal blood loss and no sutures were given after the procedure. I was given detailed post-operative instructions by the staff. Dr. Rajat made sure that the treatment was entirely safe and everyone present in the operating room including me, him and his assistants wore protective goggles. 
I was instructed not to have any hot or spicy foods and that I should maintain meticulous oral hygiene. They even prescribed me some painkillers and I was recalled after 2 weeks. Healing was satisfactory and free of any complications. Overall, my surgery was a success and the results are amazing. My speech has remarkably improved and is clear as day. I am really thankful to Dr. Rajat and his team for being so supportive and carrying out the procedure so efficiently. I am fully satisfied and will recommend his services to others too.

review:

(I've got my braces on from here - Dr. Sachdevas Dental Aesthetic & Implant Center)
It's been a little more than 1 Year and a lot has been done on my teeth.

I've seen overall a tremendous improvement in my teeth alignment, positioning and their relocation, after getting braces !

My teeth structure which was once like deep snake bite, ladder like irregular structure has now transformed into a symmetric arch.

My braces are still ON and they will be removed after sometimes but I can definitely feel the difference, like improvement in facial features, Bite/chewing has become more natural and easy! To my surprise there is improvement in my speech also!

With that,
I had an RCT, and you know the childhood trauma of sitting on that dentist chair and those big injections! But Dr. Rajat Sachdeva is very friendly *** ****** ******* ******* that you'll not even know when the procedure has been done so easily by him! 
And even after 14 Months that RCT is going strong and I didn't face any problems in that after since.

I recommend people a regular checkup of their teeth, whenever/wherever possible! because I didn't even know that I had so many cavities which could all end up in RCTs but were timely filled and saved at this clinic!

Last but not least, 
A big thanks to the Orthodontist who has been working on my teeth since over a year!  
And a big thanks to Dr. Rajat Sachdeva under whom it has all become possible.

Will update soon when the whole procedure is done.
and now i can smile with my teeth out (Literally) :D !!

Thanks
